title: Scotland vs San Marino, LIVE: Follow all the action before Wales face Croatia in Euro 2020 qualifer
text:
Sportsmail will be on hand with goal updates from all the Euro 2020 qualifiers

Conditions were dreadful and torrential rain teemed down all match

Wales face Croatia in what looks to be the most intriguing contest of the evening.

Ryan Giggs' men will be in a strong position in group E with three points and would move up to second place. Even if they fail to claim victory, two wins from their final two games and a Croatia victory over Slovakia would be enough.

Needless to say, a win on home turf against the World Cup finalists would make progression a far easier proposition.

Elsewhere, Germany go to Estonia and Austria host Slovenia while Poland take on North Macedonia.

Sportsmail will be on hand with all the build-up and goal updates from across the continent. Scroll down to see how Scotland 6-0 San Marino unfolded.
description: Wales face Croatia in what looks to be the most intriguing contest of the evening. Ryan Giggs' men will be in a strong position in group E with three points and would move up to second place.
